result.execSummary:
The defendant Earl D Stanley was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse Assessments], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Milwaukee County Clerk of Circuit Court

supervisions.notes:
Pay all the costs, fees and surcharges (including the domestic abuse assessment) during the period of probation in case 15CM1824. Failure to pay will result in a civil judgment.

Provide a DNA sample and pay DNA surcharge. Failure to pay will result in a civil judgment.
Consecutive to: to any sentence. Straight time.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Earl D Stanley

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: JusticePoint Pretrial Services Discharge Report received and filed.   rmm
JusticePoint Pretrial Services Violation Report (new arrest) received and filed.  rmm

Attorney Alexis B Stewart in court, defendant Earl D Stanley not in court, in custody.  Sarra Mae Kiaie appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Deputy Court Clerk: rmm.
JUDGE BOROWSKI FOR JUDGE DALLET.
Case set for sentencing.  Defendant has picked up a new case.  Case is adjourned to Branch 40.  Court ordered defendant REMANDED into the custody of the Milwaukee County Sheriff's Department.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for July 22, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Earl D Stanley in court with attorney Alexis B Stewart.  Sarra Mae Kiaie appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Deputy Court Clerk: rmm.  
Defendant was advised of constitutional rights and maximum penalties, waived all rights, and plead GUILTY.  Defendant examined as to the plea.  Plea Questionnaire/Waiver of Rights and Addendum received and filed.  Stipulation by parties to complaint as a factual basis to sustain the plea.  Defendant further advised that if he/she is not a US citizen, deportation is possible.  Court found the defendant guilty. Judgment of conviction entered.  Court ordered case adjourned for sentencing in Branch 40.  Court advised defendant that the no contact order remains in effect.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for June 18, 2015 at 08:30 am.
JusticePoint Pretrial Services Report received and filed.  rmm

Defendant Earl D Stanley in court with attorney Alexis B Stewart.  Sarra Mae Kiaie appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Case set for jury trial.  For reasons stated on the record. Court granted State's request for an adjournment. Case adjourned, and new jury trial date was selected.  Jury trial scheduled for June 1, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Earl D Stanley in court with attorney Alexis B Stewart.  Sarra Mae Kiaie appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Case set for Jury Trial. State informed the Court they believe the victim is coming. Case passed.
JusticePoint Pretrial Services Report received and filed.

Defendant Earl D Stanley in court with attorney Alexis B Stewart.  Sarra Mae Kiaie appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Deputy Court Clerk: rmm.  
Final Pretrial held.  Case remains set for jury trial on 4/27/15 in Branch 40.  Court reminds defendant the no contact order remains in effect.
JusticePoint Pretrial Services Discharge Report received and filed.  rmm

Defendant Earl D Stanley in court with attorney Alexis B Stewart.  Sarra Mae Kiaie appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Deputy Court Clerk: rmm.  
Status Conference held.  On motion of the state, Court ordered 15CM1063 and 15CM418 joined for the purpose of trial.  Case is adjourned to Branch 40.  Court advised defendant that the no contact order remains in effect.  Final pre-trial scheduled for April 22, 2015 at 01:30 pm.  Jury trial scheduled for April 27, 2015 at 08:30 am.
JusticePoint Pretrial Services Report received and filed.   rmm

15RM017658  Actual Date Bond Posted with Sheriff:
04-03-15

Court orders defendant TURNED OVER to JUSTICE Point for Supervision.  ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY to be monitored by portable breathalyzers.  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.  Defendant advised it is a requirement to attend all future court proceedings.  Failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.
Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with Antonia W. and her residence

Defendant Earl D Stanley in court with attorney Torrie R. Williams.  Defendant Earl D Stanley in custody.  Carole Manchester appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk:  bm
  Defendant is advised due to lower pending case this case is assigned to Judge Dallet, Branch 40.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Status conference scheduled for April 10, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
